biography:
Michèle Cortes de Leone y Fabianera, better known as her stage name Françoise Fabian (born 10 May 1933), is a French film actress. She has appeared in more than 80 films since 1956. In 1971, Fabian signed the Manifesto of the 343, publicly declaring having had an abortion.

Source: Article "Françoise Fabian" from Wikipedia in english, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
name: Françoise Fabian
